tool.name: Get TCGA 450k and expression data used for ELMER
tool.description: getTCGA to download DNA methylation, RNA expression and clinic data for all samples of certain cancer type from TCGA

tool.help:
Bioconductor package: http://bioconductor.org/packages/3.2/bioc/src/contrib/ELMER_0.99.8.tar.gz
getTCGA is a function to download DNA methylation, RNA expression and clinic data for all samples of certain cancer type from TCGA website. And downloaded data will be transform to matrixes or data frame for further analysis.
